meta.title: getCategoryById - Catalog - API Reference
meta.description:
Returns a Category from the BigCommerce Catalog.

Request Parameters

Responses

Send a Test Request

blocks.data: Returns a `Category` from the BigCommerce Catalog.

category_id.description: The ID of the `Category` to which the resource belongs.

include_fields.description: Fields to include, in a comma-separated list. The ID and the specified fields will be returned.

exclude_fields.description: Fields to exclude, in a comma-separated list. The specified fields will be excluded from a response. The ID cannot be excluded.

data.description: Response payload for the BigCommerce API.

parent_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the category's parent. This field controls where the category sits in the tree of categories that organize the catalog.

name.description: The name displayed for the category. Name is unique with respect to the category's siblings.

description.description: The product description, which can include HTML formatting.

views.description: Number of views the category has on the storefront.

sort_order.description: Priority this category will be given when included in the menu and category pages. The lower the number, the closer to the top of the results the category will be.

page_title.description: Custom title for the category page. If not defined, the category name will be used as the meta title.

search_keywords.description: A comma-separated list of keywords that can be used to locate the category when searching the store.

meta_keywords.description: Custom meta keywords for the category page. If not defined, the store's default keywords will be used. Must post as an array like: ["awesome","sauce"].

meta_description.description: Custom meta description for the category page. If not defined, the store's default meta description will be used.

layout_file.description: The layout template file used to render this category.

is_visible.description: Flag to determine whether the product should be displayed to customers browsing the store. If `true`, the category will be displayed. If `false`, the category will be hidden from view.

default_product_sort.description: Determines how the products are sorted on category page load.

image_url.description: Image URL used for this category on the storefront. Images can be uploaded via form file post to `/categories/{categoryId}/image`, or by providing a publicly accessible URL in this field.

custom_url.description: The custom URL for the category on the storefront.

is_customized.description: Returns `true` if the URL has been changed from its default state (the auto-assigned URL that BigCommerce provides).

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the category; increments sequentially.

meta.description: Empty meta object; may be used later.

data.description: Error payload for the BigCommerce API.

title.description: The error title describing the particular error.
